",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-js","meta":"{5-6}","children":"import { renderToStaticNodeStream } from 'react-dom/server';

// 路由处理程序的语法取决于使用的后端框架。

});

",["$r","Pitfall",null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["此方法将会渲染 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"无法被 hydrate 的非交互式 HTML"}],"。如果你想将 React 用作简单的静态页面生成器，或者渲染完全静态的内容（如电子邮件），那么这将会很有用。"]}],["$r","p",null,{"children":["交互式应用程序应该在服务端使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/server/renderToPipeableStream","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"renderToPipeableStream"}]}]," 并在客户端结合使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/hydrateRoot","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"hydrateRoot"}]}],"。"]}]]}]]}]]
